column4: Okay, I have a problem that I don't understand what is going on, When I try to install Ubuntu 7.10 I get the loading linux kernal.. message then the monitor goes blank and the power light flashes and the leds on the keyboard all flash too, and it just hangs there.. any ideas?
I dunno, i tried the beta 8.10 version and it did that same even when I picked the acpi problem one too
